title: Patch 5.3 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Also, you may want to check reddit as well: http://dd.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2vjbft/53_patch_bugs_megathread/

Thank you

EDIT:

- We are ware of an intermittent issue with the Patching Process, whereby the patch does not complete 100%. While we work on a permanent fix, the work around is to quit the patcher and relaunch the client. This will then allow the patcher to finish.

- We have fixed the patcher issue. You will see a small patch when updating to the latest patcher.

replies.body: so tru rito plz fix

When a game is ending(when nexus is going KABOOM) and if you keep tapping the tab button, it causes an error and prompts a windows pop up asking if you want to close the program.
Happened 3 times so far
so dont tap the tab button?
haha
I dont know why, but I just got the notification for this reply.
Thresh's lantern is missing its range indicator when on the ground. So I don't know how far I can walk (as thresh) before it cancels
I somewhat find this helpful, because I know the range indicator area, but that's not why I find it helpful, I find it helpful because the actual max grab range is increased by about 175 pixels

Lately on the patch, half of the time when I choose a champion and finish choosing my runes and masteries the 'lock in' button is grayed out so i have to wait until the end of the music until it locks the champ in for me. This is in normal's, I realize you can't lock in a champion in ranked until the other person chooses theirs also
when i play xin jungle today he's Q never kronk up the moster once and sometime even not work on champ ....
{{champion:5}}  knock*

My patch still does not finish, i posted a thread in help and support and still no reply. ive tried refreshing the launcher, reconnecting to the internet. and still it gets stuck at 1.5mb left and drops to 0kbps 
please help.

A bug that i've seen since 5.3 is with xin xaos q the third hit doesn't seem to be knocking up

there's also a bug with the friend list when if shows a friend that's online but it you invite them you get an error saying they're already in a game even though they are not in one(started in patch 5.2)

& twitch(his ult still does no dmg to nexus this has been a bug before 5.3)
There is a bug with xin zhao's q and it is that if you w then q the q will not knock up champions, minions, or monsters on the 3rd auto. It works fine when the q is active by itself
I tried this if you don't use w its still only like 10% chance to still knock up
Dont know if this is already know, but I was playing Xin in a ranked game and his Q wouldn't knock up any champs or monsters only creeps. Kinda pissed because i had no gank or engage potential.

Hey guys, Singed main here. This was a bug with 5.2 that has not been fixed yet and is still present in 5.3. The poison on the Riot Squad Singed skin is meant to be orange, however since 5.2 it is instead purple. Note, this is with colorblind mode OFF. If you turn colorblind mode ON, it gives you the usual teal gas, but with it off, it gives you purple.

Really missing the orange gas of that skin, was one of the main reasons I picked up.
I have noticed that the third attack in Xin's Q is only knocking up about 30% of the time.
I think Ahri has a bit of a bug...i just played a game with her and her "E" just said Spell Not Found...
well just went to play another game and found this..... i was playing her just befor i played Ahir....
Yeah this has just gone to %%%% for him now.
i had the same thing yesterday for a game lols
eh i saw the mystery gift pop up but i side clicked off it by mistake and it closed without opening

Hey AlliehZorfvant,

can you clarify a little? Did you buy a mystery gift or you just got a notification of someone gifting you?
We cannot see anything on your account.

The free mystery skin for good behavior it said but I misclicked off the pop up and it closed without reopening even if I logged off and on. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/et4t1a7x-mystery-skins-for-good-behavior-are-still-coming I've checked Kayle and Annie but I don't have either. Gone through all my champs twice now too :/
thanks for the comment any way
Dont know whether it's just me but I'm stuck at 99% at 0 kbps{{item:3175}}

> [{quoted}](name=ThatOnlyNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=GqEco4oe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-11T20:57:27.721+0000)
>
> Dont know whether it's just me but I'm stuck at 99% at 0 kbps{{item:3175}}

So normally when you get the 0kbps, the patcher just hasn't refreshed correctly and it is actually installing the new patch. Let it go and once the install has completed the patcher will update with Launch.
I tried waiting out then I closed up now it's scanning 900+ files

Same happened to me. Around 1700 files started downloading and now I'm in the client.
Let us know.
Okay mine started again at 2000 files. :D

0k so i just have the game die on me... when i connect to the game im ment to be in i cant move or do anything... i just have to re-download a lot of the game cos is was saying the there where champs missing... i dont know what is happening.
wow ok so im not FUKING marked with leavebuster cos the new patch FUKED up my game you guys better remove it or this game can go get fuked.

I was in this game aswel his game fully shut down on him then said things were missing from league or something. Now he has a afk ban when he couldnt even join at all. This has fully made him want to stop playing this game and i don't want that to happen plz short this out and find out what the problem is.
7 hours into this still no change thinking of quitting{{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Madly Outplayed,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=GqEco4oe,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-02-12T04:41:34.241+0000)
>
> 7 hours into this still no change thinking of quitting{{item:3070}}

Stop crying already, if you are crying for 7 hours no game, then I should **** myself for 3 weeks firewall bug LOL. 

Every patch breaks the game even more than before for Oceania atleast. Many players get lucky, we are unlucky ones. Just switch to a different game haha, less frustration,

Especially love how Toxichawk states -

> - We are ware of an intermittent issue with the Patching Process, whereby the patch does not complete 100%. While we work on a permanent fix, the work around is to quit the patcher and relaunch the client. This will then allow the patcher to finish.
> 
> - We have fixed the patcher issue. You will see a small patch when updating to the latest patcher.

Yet neither the actual patcher process is completing with multiple restarts and no patch has been downloaded throughout the 8+ difference calculations I have attempted since 9am this morning. 

If the thing is busted - All good, as much as I'd like to play today I won't. Prob wont for a few days, just out of frustration. Then if I decide I like a skin or in game content some time in the future IF I come back; I will just remind myself of the regular patch bs like this today. Don't say it is fixed and encourage players to  attempt to use the client when its not. I think this sort of frustration is globally recognized by gamers of all ages.

Doesn't seem to have been repaired to me. I attempted previous work arounds before finding this announcement including deleting rads folder items without success and then the LOL_air folder (this one 1gb+). Went through the grueling experience of downloading that again (between scanning how many files till it attempts to load) and I am still being punished with an unspecified error, bugsplat etc. 

**So far Ive clocked over 3hrs of scanning, downloading and troubleshooting. This is not the first time. I really love the game but many large patches cause me issues like this. **

This, no dominion on oce, kids and their in game drama makes me just shrug and begin to count the time and dollars spent. Being born in 85 it might just be time to grow up, maybe I am just too old for gaming?

{{summoner:13}} 

**Cheers Riot -**

*Just failed another scan at 1592 files *
All riot need to do is focus on the 99 percent players playing league of legends and stop focusing on the 1% that are in the lcs. Because the lcs are fine.{{champion:74}} Nerf this guy too.

I have tried to log on to my account and all it said was connection error cant connect to Pvp.net. I've tried everything from support, websites and Youtube videos and not one have them has worked. Also the last thing I saw on the game was can not connect to windows firewall when I tried to start a match. I have spent over $100 on this game. Please help me!
If you read this go to your launcher. Click the ? mark is the top right corner. Then click 'repair.' That should work. {{champion:238}}
Third strike of Xin Zhoa is no longer knocking up enemies. Pretty major champ bug.

In Twisted tree line when playing as nidalee you w into the health pot and it counts as a reset?? don't know if intended or purposely put there but i thought it was only a reset when you kill a unit (Champions, Monsters, Minions)… 
(IN COUGAR FORM)

In game bug where I was playing Heartseeker Vayne against a default Quinn (I dont know if skins matter but Ill say it anyway just in case). I was fighting her one on one in bush and I died just before I auto attacked quinn. The damage from the mid-air bolt did not count and neither did {{champion:67}}'s w passive nor the {{item:3087}}  passive.

Which shouldve killed her.
As mentioned, xin q bug and most of the time the q doesn't knockup.

i am done with u and ur updates riot coz even tho yous said yous fixed some bugs stop focusing on updating the champs looks and actually fix the bugs coz at start of game it wouldnt let me out of the cage thing while everyone else could and i had to dc than reconnect bak so it would let me out
Cry more. It happens to everyone
Lux's e (ball of light) is still invisible after so many patches. I'm getting killed by an ability i can't see.

So a slight visual bug/ thing that happens. When Kalista (Only tested using Blood moon Kalista) binds Malphite (Using the glacial skin) Malphite does this kind of sprint animation towards the ground. It has happened every time I have tried it. Just thought you should know :)
Super galaxy rumble special interactions with tristana not working since tristana update.
